participant_1.name: Christian
participant_1.personality: Introverted and contemplative, often feeling overwhelmed by life’s challenges.
participant_1.background: I work at a nursing home. I am overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I don't believe in God.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, with a passion for animals and a strong work ethic.
participant_2.background: My cats are very special to me. I'm a construction worker. My dad taught me everything I know. I've got 5 cats.

content.text: I didn’t go to school my dad thought me everything
